title: Institutions lean into crypto despite Bitcoin price slump
description: Institutions across the globe are adopting cryptocurrency, offering new services and buying into blockchain tech, despite slumping Bitcoin price.

title: Retail vs. whales: Who actually drives the Santa rally?
description: Is the Santa Rally driven by retail FOMO or whale-sized capital flows? Here’s what actually fuels December’s market surge in stocks and crypto.

title: Cloudflare outage hits multiple crypto websites, social media channels
description: Many users reported not having access to websites, including Coinbase and Blockchain.com, and social media platforms after Cloudflare reported an “internal service degradation.”

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Brazil weighs tax on international crypto transfers as it aligns rules with CARF
description: Brazil is reportedly considering imposing a tax on the use of cryptocurrency for international payments, as it aligns its rules with a global standard for sharing tax data.

title: Crypto private key theft is now big business: Here’s what to know
description: Private key theft has become an automated, industrialized threat, highlighting the need for crypto users to remain vigilant, according to a report by GK8, a subsidiary of Galaxy Digital.

title: Pantera-backed aPriori silent after one entity claims 60% of airdrop
description: About 60% of aPriori’s APR airdrop was claimed by a single entity across 14,000 interconnected wallets, according to Bubblemaps.

title: How Pi Network’s 50M nodes could reshape the future of decentralized AI
description: Pi is turning its giant mobile community into a distributed compute grid, testing whether AI can run on a global crowd instead of the cloud.

title: El Salvador’s latest $100M Bitcoin haul rekindles questions around IMF program
description: El Salvador says it has bought 1,090 BTC worth over $100 million, raising questions about an IMF loan pledge to limit Bitcoin exposure and fiscal risks.

title: Mastercard taps Polygon to turn clunky crypto addresses into simple usernames
description: Mastercard is rolling out verified, human-readable crypto aliases to self-custody wallets, using Polygon for onchain support and Mercuryo for identity verification.

title: Zcash Price Prediction as ZEC Becomes a Top 20 Global Crypto – Can it Overtake XRP?

title: LevelField Wins Illinois Nod To Acquire Burling Bank For Crypto Services
description: LevelField has received Illinois approval to acquire Chicago-based Burling Bank and has proposed combining FDIC-insured community banking with crypto custody, trading, and credit products while the transaction awaits Federal Reserve review. title: Dimensional Becomes Second Firm to Win SEC ETF-Mutual Fund Hybrid Approval
description: Dimensional Fund Advisors secured SEC approval to operate ETF and mutual fund share classes in a single structure, positioning itself as the first to apply this hybrid model to actively managed strategies while nearly 90 other firms await similar clearance. title: Mastercard Selects Polygon to Power Verified Username Transfers for Self-Custody Wallets

title: Korea Faces Fresh Crypto Tax Chaos as 2027 Deadline Nears: Report
description: South Korean crypto tax implementation faces a fourth potential delay to 2027 after proposed amendments to the Income Tax Act failed to address fundamental issues, and research warns that continued postponements could trigger tax resistance among cryptocurrency users and destabilize the market. title: Bitcoin Miner HIVE Digital Scores 285% Revenue Pump Thanks To BTC Expansion
description: HIVE Digital Technologies delivered record second-quarter revenue of $87.3 million, surging 285% from the prior year, as the Canadian miner aggressively expanded Bitcoin operations to 25 EH/s while scaling its high-performance computing division amid broader industry pressure. title: Bitcoin Slides Below $90K as ETF Investors Face First Major Losses – More Dips Ahead?
